data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
In the minute 2, The match at Mapei Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luca Cigarini, who is down injured.
Luca Cigarini for Crotone is back on the field again.
Ivano Pezzuto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Crotone at Mapei Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Crotone have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Crotone in the half of Sassuolo.
Luca Cigarini (Crotone) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 13, Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo has run offside.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Crotone.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Crotone just outside Sassuolo's area.
Junior Messias for Crotone drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Domenico Berardi is on target to give Sassuolo a 1-0 advantage.
Gregoire Defrel instrumental with a fine assist.
Crotone are caught offside.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Crotone.
Crotone surge into the attack at Mapei Stadium but Luca Marrone’s header is off-target.
Ivano Pezzuto awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Can Crotone capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sassuolo's Vlad Chiriches has been booked in Reggio Emilia.
In Reggio Emilia Crotone drive forward through Luca Cigarini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 26, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
In the minute 28, Ivano Pezzuto signals a Crotone throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Ivano Pezzuto awards the home team a throw-in.
Mert Muldur for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Vlad Chiriches is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 34, It seems as if Vlad Chiriches is unable to continue. Kaan Ayhan replaces him for the home team.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Crotone at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 36, Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Crotone.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 39, Sassuolo's Kaan Ayhan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Crotone drives forward and Milos Vulic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 43, Attention is being given to Crotone’s Simeon Nwankwo and play has been suspended briefly.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a Crotone throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Simeon Nwankwo is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Crotone drive upfield and Junior Messias gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
Crotone's Luca Cigarini misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 45, Crotone pushes forward through Junior Messias, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over at Mapei Stadium.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Sassuolo's area.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
An attacking Crotone player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 49, The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Simeon Nwankwo.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Ivano Pezzuto signals a Crotone throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 52, Ivano Pezzuto awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos is replacing Mert Muldur for the home team.
Pedro Obiang is on a sub for Mehdi Bourabia for Sassuolo.
In the minute 57, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Sassuolo.
It's advantage Sassuolo in Reggio Emilia as Francesco Caputo scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
Simeon Nwankwo for Crotone has been booked by Ivano Pezzuto and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, Giorgos Kyriakopoulos for Sassuolo is whistled offside.
Throw-in Sassuolo.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 63, Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Filip Djuricic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Lisandro Magallan (Crotone) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Crotone.
Filip Djuricic is back on the pitch.
Crotone will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sassuolo.
In the minute 65, At Mapei Stadium, Luca Cigarini has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Ivano Pezzuto.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Crotone.
Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 70, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Crotone.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Ivano Pezzuto.
Crotone's Junior Messias looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 75, Ivano Pezzuto waits before resuming play because Junior Messias for Crotone is still down.
Crotone drive forward but Junior Messias is judged offside.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Milos Vulic with Denis Dragus.
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Tomislav Gomelt replacing Luca Cigarini.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 79, Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Reggio Emilia.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic is whistled for offside at Mapei Stadium.
Junior Messias (Crotone) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Reggio Emilia.
Crotone make their third substitution with Andrea Rispoli replacing Pedro Pereira.
It's now 3-1 in Reggio Emilia as Francesco Caputo scores for Sassuolo.
In the minute 85, That's a fine assist from Domenico Berardi.
Sassuolo needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Reggio Emilia to check on Denis Dragus, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 87, The match at Mapei Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kaan Ayhan, who is down injured.
Crotone's Denis Dragus is back in action after a slight knock.
Sassuolo’s Kaan Ayhan is on his feet again at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 89, Crotone are pushing forward but Denis Dragus's finish is wide of the goal.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Sassuolo!
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Reggio Emilia.
Ivano Pezzuto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Ivano Pezzuto signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Sassuolo's area.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
Hamed Junior Traore is replacing Filip Djuricic for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
The home team have replaced Gregoire Defrel with Federico Peluso. This is the fifth substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
Goal! Manuel Locatelli extends Sassuolo's lead to 4-1.
